swp.tuilmenau.carduinodroid.controller

Class Cam

  • java.lang.Object
    • swp.tuilmenau.carduinodroid.controller.Cam
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable, CameraCallback

    public class Cam
extends Object
implements CameraCallback, Runnable
    The Cam Class is used to set the settings, initialized the cam, the socket and the preview.
    Author:
    Robin
    See Also:
    Camera
